nodes.text: The Waterfalls of Akar Kesh was a region on the planet Tython located by the Tho Yor monolith known as Akar Kesh. Numerous islands dotted the region and the various rivers were fed from the waterfalls. This environment created a tranquil setting that was perfect for meditation due to its isolated nature.

After the Despot War, Je'daii General Rajivari departed active service from the Je'daii Order in order to contemplate on the Force. Following the arrival of the Force Hound Xesh, Je'daii Master Ketu went to the Waterfalls of Akar Kesh to seek the advice of Rajivari concerning a Force vision.
